survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and usage patterns related to smart kitchen appliances to help manufacturers improve product offerings and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who select 'None of the above' will skip to Q5.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure the list covers a broad range of common smart kitchen appliances.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who select 'None of the above' will skip to Q5.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart kitchen appliances?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondents selected at least one smart kitchen appliance in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart kitchen appliances?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondents selected at least one smart kitchen appliance in Q1.

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if respondents selected at least one smart kitchen appliance in Q1.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the smart features of your kitchen appliances?

script.question_text: How often do you use the smart features of your kitchen appliances?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if respondents selected at least one smart kitchen appliance in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to purchase a smart kitchen appliance in the future?
answer_options: Better integration with existing smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to purchase a smart kitchen appliance in the future?
answer_options: Better integration with existing smart home devices

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or concerns you have about smart kitchen appliances.
